subject: MIssing order items
description_text:
Hello,

I ordered on  June 20, 2025(order id 3055960243000750 on Aliexpress) the
upgraded brake it for the Pro Plus pedals and besides I did received it
very late ( last week) I did not get in the package the hidraulic rod. I
received only the elastomers, plastic spacers and the small spring.
